snippet: Mayor Bill de Blasio has come to see his rift with former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, his predecessor, as a political liability and has recently hailed him as a champion for New York City.
abstract: Mayor Bill de Blasio has adopted warmer tone towards former Mayor Michael R Bloomberg after he and his advisers determine that rift between two is unnecessary political liability; recently has hailed Bloomberg as champion for city and applauded his efforts, which led to expanding No 7 subway line.
lead_paragraph: Mayor Bill de Blasio has come to see his rift with former Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg, his predecessor, as a political liability and has recently hailed him as a champion for New York City.

headline.main: De Blasio Adopts a Warmer Tone Toward Bloomberg
headline.print_headline: On Second Thought, de Blasio Likes Mike, Sort Of
